Text: Be careful when creating torrents not to accidently include files such as .DS_Store which is a hidden file created by Windows. As this is hidden and modified as needed, chances are poor that anyone would be able to reseed this torrent once they had opened the directory and viewed the movie. Better torrent clients have the option to ignore this and similar files when creating a torrent, and it is good to also set Windows to view hidden files and to not cache thumbnails.
